text: Brad Falchuk is a television writer, director, and producer. His works include the television series Nip/Tuck, Glee, Mutant X, Earth: Final Conflict, Veritas: The Quest, and American Horror Story. He was born in 1971 and is Jewish. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:American screenwriters Category:American Jews Category:American television writers Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:writers from Massachusetts
title: Brad Falchuk
